org.descripter.js

Class Bool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.descripter.js.Bool

  • public class Bool
extends java.lang.Object

    A wrapper class for booleans.

    This class is useful for descripters.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org
